name: PLANTROPY
description:
Description:

Aunty Rose has been called in for a last minute shift at work and needs you to look after her plants! You've got a pretty free day, and how difficult could caring for plants be?

The Sunflowers, Orchid and Cactus all need care throughout the day. Get to know them and find some time to relax. Maybe you'll even learn a thing or two!

Features:

  • Visual Novel
  • Five unique characters
  • Beautiful backgrounds
  • Informative Resources
  • All around fun!

Resources:

Plantropy is a game with a heavy focus on care, wether that is personal or impersonal. Below are a series of resources that we used to inform our research into creating these characters. We believe they are useful to share with you!

  • Non-verbal Autism 
  • Autistic masking 
  • Climate Health 
  • UV radiation and climate change
